original_text: But when his heart was lifted up, and his mind hardened in pride, he was deposed from his kingly throne, and they took his glory from him:
korean_text: 그가 마음이 높아지며 뜻이 완악하여 교만을 행하므로 그의 왕위가 폐한 바 되며 그의 영광을 빼앗기고

sentences.original_text: But when his heart was lifted up
and his mind hardened in pride
he was deposed from his kingly throne
and they took his glory from him:
